t: Amazon
s: This is a real interesting flavor. As a 5th gen Texan I consider myself a BBQ consultant of sorts -- admittedly, I had never heard of Open Pit brand. It's very, very tangy with only a subtle sweetness, and a nice consistency that is neither runny or thick with molasses.
